docs.snippet: London-based credit-focused hedge fund firm Numen Capital has hired Egerton Capital investment analyst Marcello Sallusti to launch a new fund, three sources told Reuters.
docs.lead_paragraph: London-based credit-focused hedge fund firm Numen Capital has hired Egerton Capital investment analyst Marcello Sallusti to launch a new fund, three sources told Reuters.

headline.main: Numen Capital Hires Ex-Egerton Investment Analyst to Lead New Fund-Sources
headline.print_headline: Numen Capital Hires Ex-Egerton Investment Analyst to Lead New Fund-Sources

docs.snippet: Kathryn Sargent made history on Wednesday by becoming the first female master tailor to open her own shop in London's prestigious Savile Row.
docs.lead_paragraph: Kathryn Sargent made history on Wednesday by becoming the first female master tailor to open her own shop in London's prestigious Savile Row.

headline.main: First Female Master Tailor Opens Own Shop in London's Historic Savile Row
headline.print_headline: First Female Master Tailor Opens Own Shop in London's Historic Savile Row

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc on Wednesday expanded its live video product, Facebook Live, giving the feature prominent placement on its app and rolling out features to make it easier for users to search and comment in real time.
docs.lead_paragraph: Facebook Inc on Wednesday expanded its live video product, Facebook Live, giving the feature prominent placement on its app and rolling out features to make it easier for users to search and comment in real time.

headline.main: Facebook Expands Live Video, Challenging TV and Web Rivals
headline.print_headline: Facebook Expands Live Video, Challenging TV and Web Rivals

docs.snippet: Iceland's two government coalition parties have decided to keep working together and will appoint a new prime minister, a well placed source within the government told Reuters on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Iceland's two government coalition parties have decided to keep working together and will appoint a new prime minister, a well placed source within the government told Reuters on Wednesday.

headline.main: Iceland Coalition Agrees to Stay in Government: Government Source
headline.print_headline: Iceland Coalition Agrees to Stay in Government: Government Source

docs.snippet: French President Francois Hollande on Wednesday appointed to a different post a diplomat he had originally nominated as ambassador to the Holy See, who media said had been rejected by the Vatican because he was gay.
docs.lead_paragraph: French President Francois Hollande on Wednesday appointed to a different post a diplomat he had originally nominated as ambassador to the Holy See, who media said had been rejected by the Vatican because he was gay.

headline.main: France Abandons Bid to Appoint Gay Ambassador to Vatican
headline.print_headline: France Abandons Bid to Appoint Gay Ambassador to Vatican

docs.snippet: Dozens of journalists at oil-price reporting agency Argus Media are set to become multi-millionaires when a deal to bring an investor onboard goes through later this year, potentially valuing the firm at as much as $1.3 billion.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of journalists at oil-price reporting agency Argus Media are set to become multi-millionaires when a deal to bring an investor onboard goes through later this year, potentially valuing the firm at as much as $1.3 billion.

headline.main: Argus Stake Sale to Produce Dozens of Millionaire Journalists
headline.print_headline: Argus Stake Sale to Produce Dozens of Millionaire Journalists

docs.snippet: Deutsche Bank has suspended five wealth management executives, a source familiar with the matter said.
docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank has suspended five wealth management executives, a source familiar with the matter said.

headline.main: Deutsche Bank Suspends Five Wealth Management Executives-Source
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Suspends Five Wealth Management Executives-Source

docs.snippet: Big airlines are making waves in the oil market for the first time since prices went into a tailspin nearly two years ago, betting this may be their best chance to lock in cheap jet fuel for years to come, industry and market sources say.
docs.lead_paragraph: Big airlines are making waves in the oil market for the first time since prices went into a tailspin nearly two years ago, betting this may be their best chance to lock in cheap jet fuel for years to come, industry and market sources say.

headline.main: Airline Hedges Fuel Rally in Later Dated Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Airline Hedges Fuel Rally in Later Dated Oil Prices

docs.snippet: When a founder of a tech startup wants to buy a home but has all his money parked in illiquid stock, or a pro-athlete wants to buy a Porsche but has not yet received his guaranteed payout, Morgan Stanley wants to be the lender they turn to.
docs.lead_paragraph: When a founder of a tech startup wants to buy a home but has all his money parked in illiquid stock, or a pro-athlete wants to buy a Porsche but has not yet received his guaranteed payout, Morgan Stanley wants to be the lender they turn to.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Aims to Double Custom Loans for Wealthy Clients
headline.print_headline: Morgan Stanley Aims to Double Custom Loans for Wealthy Clients

docs.snippet: South Africa's First National Bank (FNB) has closed the accounts of a company owned by the wealthy Gupta family, the latest example of companies cutting ties with the Guptas following allegations over their relationship with President Jacob Zuma.
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa's First National Bank (FNB) has closed the accounts of a company owned by the wealthy Gupta family, the latest example of companies cutting ties with the Guptas following allegations over their relationship with President Jacob Zuma.

headline.main: South Africa's FNB Bank Closes Accounts of Gupta Holding Company
headline.print_headline: South Africa's FNB Bank Closes Accounts of Gupta Holding Company
